import sys
import math

def main():
	n = raw_input()
	num = int(n)
	for i in range(num,10000000):
		rev_num = int(str(i)[::-1])
		if i == rev_num:
			t = check_prime(i)
			if t:
				print i
				sys.exit()
def check_prime(number):
	for i in xrange(2,int(round(math.sqrt(number))+1),1):
		if number%i == 0:
			return False
	return True

if __name__ == "__main__":
	main()
